high_descs: Turn left, walk straight to the wall, make a right when you reach the wall and walk straight to the small end table.
Turn on the lamp on the end table.
Grab the statue on the end table.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp and grab a statue from the end table.

high_descs: Make a left to walk to the corner of the room where the side table with the statue is.
Turn on the lamp on the side table.
Pick up the statue from the side table.
anns.task_desc: Look at a statue under a lit lamp.

high_descs: Take a step forward, then turn left and walk over to the wall, turn right and walk up to the small wooden table.
Turn on the light of the small lamp on the table.
Pick up the large statue off of the wooden table.
anns.task_desc: Examine a statue in the light of a small lamp.
